citation: Ark. Code § 20‑64‑602(b)(19) (Standards for alcohol and drug abuse programs)
administering_body: Division of Aging, Adult, and Behavioral Health Services / Office of Substance Abuse and Mental Health (OSAMH)
effects: Authorizes the division to develop and promulgate standards and rules for accrediting, certifying, and licensing alcohol and drug abuse prevention, treatment and rehabilitation programs【720090630275044†L160-L200】.
